articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Wanted: Weirdos and misfits - aide to UK's Johnson is hiring
articles.description: The senior adviser to Prime Minister Boris Johnson, who plotted Brexit and steered his boss to last month's election triumph, is on the lookout for "weirdos and misfits with odd skills" to help bring new ideas to Britain's government.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - The senior adviser to Prime Minister Boris Johnson, who plotted Brexit and steered his boss to last month’s election triumph, is on the lookout for “weirdos and misfits with odd skills” to help bring new ideas to Britain’s government. 
"We… [+1481 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: U.S. imposes sanctions on Cuban defense minister over support for Venezuela's Maduro
articles.description: The U.S. State Department on Thursday imposed sanctions on Cuba's defense minister for alleged human rights violations and his support of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, barring him and his children from entering the United States.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The U.S. State Department on Thursday imposed sanctions on Cuba’s defense minister for alleged human rights violations and his support of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, barring him and his children from entering the United States.… [+323 chars]

articles.author: Dan Whitcomb
articles.title: Leader of U.S. border militia group pleads guilty to weapons charge
articles.description: The leader of a small right-wing militia accused of illegally detaining immigrants as they crossed the U.S. border with Mexico pleaded guilty on Thursday to federal weapons charges, prosecutors and a defense lawyer said.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - The leader of a small right-wing militia accused of illegally detaining immigrants as they crossed the U.S. border with Mexico pleaded guilty on Thursday to federal weapons charges, prosecutors and a defense lawyer said.

articles.author: Chris Kirkham
articles.title: Trump administration restricts some e-cigarette flavors
articles.description: The Trump administration on Thursday announced a ban on some popular e-cigarette flavors, including fruit and mint, to curb rising teenage use of vaping products, allowing only menthol and tobacco flavors to remain on the market.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - The Trump administration on Thursday announced a ban on some popular e-cigarette flavors, including fruit and mint, to curb rising teenage use of vaping products, allowing only menthol and tobacco flavors to remain on the market.

articles.author: Lisa Rapaport
articles.title: Gun homicides of teens rise after 'Stand Your Ground' self-defense law
articles.description: (Reuters Health) - Florida's "Stand Your Ground" self-defense law has been associated with a surge in teen deaths by homicide with a firearm, a new study suggests.
articles.content:
(Reuters Health) - Florida’s “Stand Your Ground” self-defense law has been associated with a surge in teen deaths by homicide with a firearm, a new study suggests.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Illumina abandons $1.2 bln deal to buy rival Pacific Biosciences
articles.description: Illumina Inc on Thursday agreed to terminate the $1.2 billion deal to buy smaller rival Pacific Biosciences of California Inc , weeks after the U.S. competition watchdog filed a complaint to block the purchase.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Illumina Inc (ILMN.O) on Thursday agreed to terminate the $1.2 billion deal to buy smaller rival Pacific Biosciences of California Inc (PACB.O), weeks after the U.S. competition watchdog filed a complaint to block the purchase.

articles.title: U.S. oil deals hit five-year high in 2019 on Occidental's blockbuster Anadarko buy
articles.description: The value of U.S. oil and gas mergers and acquisitions reached a five-year peak of $96 billion in 2019 on the back of competing bids for Anadarko Petroleum, energy data provider Enverus said on Thursday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - The value of U.S. oil and gas mergers and acquisitions reached a five-year peak of $96 billion in 2019 on the back of competing bids for Anadarko Petroleum, energy data provider Enverus said on Thursday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Australian navy races to rescue thousands as new fire threat looms
articles.description: The Australian navy was racing on Friday to rescue thousands of people stranded on the east coast of the fire-ravaged country as a searing weather front was set to whip up more blazes across the states of Victoria and New South Wales (NSW).

articles.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street starts 2020 with records as China stimulus adds to optimistic mood
articles.description: Wall Street's major indexes notched record highs to open the new year on Thursday, as fresh economic stimulus from China added to optimism fueled by easing trade tensions and an improving global outlook.
articles.content:
Jan 2 (Reuters) - Wall Street’s major indexes notched record highs to open the new year on Thursday, as fresh economic stimulus from China added to optimism fueled by easing trade tensions and an improving global outlook.
